chapters.title: Introduction to ETFs
chapters.summary: This chapter provides a comprehensive overview of Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs), including their definition, history, and benefits.

chapters.title: Building a Portfolio with ETFs
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the steps involved in building a diversified portfolio using ETFs. It covers topics such as selecting the right ETFs, understanding fees, and monitoring performance.

chapters.title: Asset Allocation Strategies
chapters.summary: This chapter delves into various asset allocation strategies, including strategic, tactical, and dynamic allocation. It discusses how to allocate assets effectively to achieve long-term financial goals.

chapters.title: Case Studies in ETF Portfolio Management
chapters.summary: This chapter presents real-world case studies of successful ETF portfolio management. It analyzes different approaches and strategies used by investors to build and manage their portfolios.
